import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { public openCart: boolean = false; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } // For Mobile Device toggleCart() { this.openCart = !this.openCart; } }
